item.title: Could Tesla’s Q4 Earnings Fuel the Next Rally?
item.description: Tesla’s earnings report appears to have removed a ton of uncertainty, and we should see a fresh push higher into the rest of the quarter.

item.title: Is Take-Two Interactive the Last Pure-Play Gaming Stock?
item.description: Take-Two Interactive is quickly becoming the best pure-play video game stock on the market, but does that make it a good buy? Read on to learn more.

item.title: 3 ETFs Catapulting Beyond the S&P to Start the Year
item.description: Three ETFs with year-to-date performance of 30% or better include a fund focused on drone technology, one targeting nickel miners, and a covered call ...

item.title: Digging Into Demand: Copper’s Scarcity Premium Is Rising
item.description: Copper prices are decoupling from traditional economic cycles as the massive power needs of artificial intelligence create a historic supply deficit.

item.title: Frozen Assets: Winter Storm Fern Is Heating Up These 3 Energy Winners
item.description: Intense winter storms stress the power grid and demonstrate the value of reliable nuclear generation and robust natural gas infrastructure.
